<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Re:</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>[Base][Additional] Call Option Transaction</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The purpose of this communication (this &#147;<b>Confirmation</b>&#148;) is to set forth the terms and conditions of the call option transaction entered into on the Trade Date specified below (the &#147;<b>Transaction</b>&#148;) between [<i>Dealer</i>] (&#147;<b>Dealer</b>&#148;), and Plug Power Inc. (&#147;<b>Counterparty</b>&#148;).&#160; This communication constitutes a &#147;Confirmation&#148; as referred to in the Agreement specified below.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>This Confirmation is subject to, and incorporates, the definitions and provisions of the 2006 ISDA Definitions (the &#147;<b>2006 Definitions</b>&#148;) and the definitions and provisions of the 2002 ISDA Equity Derivatives Definitions (the &#147;<b>Equity Definitions</b>&#148; and, together with the 2006 Definitions, the &#147;<b>Definitions</b>&#148;), in each case as published by the International Swaps and Derivatives Association,&nbsp;Inc. (&#147;<b>ISDA</b>&#148;).&#160; Certain defined terms used herein have the meanings assigned to them in the preliminary Offering Memorandum dated March&nbsp;[&#160; ], 2018 (the &#147;<b>Offering Memorandum</b>&#148;) relating to the USD[100,000,000] principal amount of [&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;]% Convertible Senior Notes due 2023 (the &#147;<b>Base Convertible Securities</b>&#148;) issued by Counterparty (as increased by up to an additional USD[15,000,000] principal amount of [&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;]% Convertible Senior Notes due 2023 [that may be](1)&nbsp;issued pursuant to the option to purchase additional convertible securities [exercised on the date hereof](2)&nbsp;(the &#147;<b>Optional Convertible Securities</b>&#148; and, together with the Base Convertible Securities, the &#147;<b>Convertible Securities</b>&#148;)) pursuant to an Indenture [to be] dated March&nbsp;[&nbsp;&nbsp;], 2018 between Counterparty and Wilmington Trust, National Association, as trustee (the &#147;<b>Indenture</b>&#148;).&#160; In the event of any inconsistency between the terms defined in the Indenture and this Confirmation, this Confirmation shall govern.&#160; The parties acknowledge that this Confirmation is entered into on the date hereof with the understanding that (i)&nbsp;definitions set forth in the Indenture that are also defined herein by reference to the Indenture and (ii)&nbsp;sections of the Indenture that are referred to herein, in each case, will conform to the descriptions thereof in the Offering Memorandum.&#160; If any such definitions in the Indenture or any such sections of the Indenture differ from the descriptions thereof in the Offering Memorandum, the descriptions thereof in the Offering Memorandum will govern for purposes of this Confirmation.&#160; [For the avoidance of doubt, subject to the foregoing, references herein to sections of the Indenture are based on the draft of the Indenture most recently reviewed by the parties at the time of execution of this Confirmation.&#160; If any relevant sections of the Indenture are changed, added or renumbered between the execution of this Confirmation and the execution of the Indenture, the parties will amend this Confirmation in good faith and in a commercially reasonable manner to preserve the economic intent of the parties, as evidenced by such draft of the Indenture.&#160; In addition, subject to the foregoing, the](3)&nbsp;[The](4)&nbsp;parties acknowledge that references to the Indenture herein are references to the Indenture as in effect on the date of its execution and if the Indenture is, or the Convertible Securities are, amended, modified or supplemented following the date of their execution, any such amendment, modification or supplement (other than any amendment, modification or supplement (i)&nbsp;pursuant to Section&nbsp;14.07 of the Indenture, subject to the provisions opposite the caption &#147;Discretionary Adjustments&#148; in Section&nbsp;2 hereof, or (ii)&nbsp;pursuant to Section&nbsp;10.01(n)&nbsp;of the Indenture that, as determined by the Calculation Agent in good</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade align="left" style="color:black;"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)&nbsp; Include for base capped call.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)&nbsp; Include for additional capped call.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)&nbsp; Include for Base Call Option Transaction Confirmation or the Additional Call Option Transaction Confirmation if signed before the closing date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(4)&nbsp; Include for Additional Call Option Transaction Confirmation if signed on or after the closing date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">faith and in a commercially reasonable manner, conforms the Indenture to the description of Convertible Securities in the Offering Memorandum) will be disregarded for purposes of this Confirmation unless the parties agree otherwise in writing.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Each party is hereby advised, and each such party acknowledges, that the other party has engaged in, or refrained from engaging in, substantial financial transactions and has taken other material actions in reliance upon the parties&#146; entry into the Transaction to which this Confirmation relates on the terms and conditions set forth below.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Confirmation evidences a complete and binding agreement between Dealer and Counterparty as to the terms of the Transaction to which this Confirmation relates.&#160; This Confirmation shall be subject to an agreement (the &#147;<b>Agreement</b>&#148;) in the form of the 1992 ISDA Master Agreement (Multicurrency&#151;Cross Border) as if Dealer and Counterparty had executed an agreement in such form on the date hereof (but without any Schedule except for (i)&nbsp;the election of Loss and Second Method and US Dollars (&#147;<b>USD</b>&#148;) as the Termination Currency, (ii)&nbsp;the replacement of the word &#147;third&#148; in the last line of Section&nbsp;5(a)(i)&nbsp;of the Agreement with the word &#147;first&#148;, (iii)&nbsp;the election of the laws of the State of New York as the governing law (without reference to choice of law doctrine) and (iv)&nbsp;the election that the &#147;Cross Default&#148; provisions of Section&nbsp;5(a)(vi)&nbsp;of the Agreement shall apply to Dealer with a &#147;Threshold Amount&#148; of three percent of Dealer&#146;s parent&#146;s shareholders&#146; equity; <i>provided</i> that (A)&nbsp;&#147;Specified Indebtedness&#148; shall not include obligations in respect of deposits received in the ordinary course of Dealer&#146;s banking business, (B)&nbsp;the phrase &#147;or becoming capable at such time of being declared&#148; shall be deleted from clause (1)&nbsp;of such Section&nbsp;5(a)(vi)&nbsp;and (C)&nbsp;the following language shall be added to the end of such Section&nbsp;5(a)(vi): &#147;Notwithstanding the foregoing, a default under subsection (2)&nbsp;hereof shall not constitute an Event of Default if (x)&nbsp;the default was caused solely by error or omission of an administrative or operational nature; (y)&nbsp;funds were available to enable the party to make the payment when due; and (z)&nbsp;the payment is made within two Local Business Days of such party&#146;s receipt of written notice of its failure to pay.&#148;).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">All provisions contained in, or incorporated by reference to, the Agreement will govern this Confirmation except as expressly modified herein.&#160; In the event of any inconsistency among this Confirmation, the Equity Definitions, the 2006 Definitions or the Agreement, the following shall prevail in the order of precedence indicated: (i)&nbsp;this Confirmation; (ii)&nbsp;the Equity Definitions; (iii)&nbsp;the 2006 Definitions; and (iv)&nbsp;the Agreement.&#160; For the avoidance of doubt, except to the extent of an express conflict, the application of any provision of this Confirmation, the Agreement, the Equity Definitions or the 2006 Definitions shall not be construed to exclude or limit any other provision of this Confirmation, the Agreement, the Equity Definitions or the 2006 Definitions.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Transaction hereunder shall be the sole Transaction under the Agreement.&#160; If there exists any ISDA Master Agreement between Dealer and Counterparty or any confirmation or other agreement between Dealer and Counterparty pursuant to which an ISDA Master Agreement is deemed to exist between Dealer and Counterparty, then notwithstanding anything to the contrary in such ISDA Master Agreement, such confirmation or agreement or any other agreement to which Dealer and Counterparty are parties, the Transaction shall not be considered a Transaction under, or otherwise governed by, such existing or deemed ISDA Master Agreement.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Transaction constitutes a Share Option Transaction for purposes of the Equity Definitions.&#160; The terms of the particular Transaction to which this Confirmation relates are as follows:</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Cap Price:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">USD3.8200</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Rounding of   Strike Price/</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Cap Price/Option   Entitlement:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In connection with any adjustment to the Option   Entitlement, Strike Price or Cap Price, the Calculation Agent will round the   adjusted Option Entitlement to the nearest 0.0001 and the adjusted Strike   Price or Cap Price to the nearest USD0.0001, as the case may be.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Number of   Shares:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As of any date, a number of Shares equal to the   product of the Number of Options and the Option Entitlement.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">

<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Convertible Securities   with a &#147;Conversion Date&#148; (as defined in the Indenture) occurring prior to the   Free Convertibility Date or (y)&nbsp;any conversion of Convertible Securities   in respect of which holder(s)&nbsp;of such Convertible Securities would be   entitled to an increase in the Conversion Rate pursuant to a Make-Whole   Adjustment (any such conversion described in clause (x)&nbsp;or clause (y),   an &#147;<b>Early Conversion</b>&#148;), to which   the provisions of Section&nbsp;8(b)(iii)&nbsp;of this Confirmation shall   apply), the date on which the holder of such Convertible Security satisfies   all of the requirements for conversion thereof as set forth in   Section&nbsp;14.02(b)&nbsp;of the Indenture, <i>provided </i>that   no Conversion Date shall be deemed to have occurred with respect to Exchanged   Securities (such Convertible Securities, other than Exchanged Securities, the   &#147;<b>Relevant Convertible Securities</b>&#148; for   such Conversion Date).](8)</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[With respect to any   conversion of a Convertible Security (other than (x)&nbsp;any conversion of   Convertible Securities with a &#147;Conversion Date&#148; (as defined in the Indenture)   occurring prior to the Free Convertibility Date or (y)&nbsp;any conversion of   Convertible Securities in respect of which holder(s)&nbsp;of such Convertible   Securities would be entitled to an increase in the Conversion Rate pursuant   to a Make-Whole Adjustment (any such conversion described in clause   (x)&nbsp;or clause (y), an &#147;<b>Early   Conversion</b>&#148;), to which the provisions of   Section&nbsp;8(b)(iii)&nbsp;of this Confirmation shall apply), the date on   which the holder of such Convertible Security satisfies all of the   requirements for conversion thereof as set forth in   Section&nbsp;14.02(b)&nbsp;of the Indenture for Convertible Securities that   are not &#147;Relevant Convertible Securities&#148; under (and as defined in) the   confirmation between the parties hereto regarding the Base Call Option   Transaction dated March&nbsp;[&nbsp;&nbsp;], 2018 (the &#147;<b>Base Call   Option Transaction Confirmation</b>&#148;), <i>provided </i>that   no Conversion Date shall be deemed to have occurred with respect to Exchanged   Securities (such Convertible Securities, other than Exchanged Securities, the   &#147;<b>Relevant Convertible Securities</b>&#148; for   such Conversion Date).&nbsp; For the   purposes of determining whether any Convertible Securities will be Relevant   Convertible Securities hereunder or &#147;Relevant Convertible Securities&#148; under   the Base Call Option Transaction Confirmation, Convertible Securities that   are converted pursuant to the Indenture shall be allocated first to the Base   Call Option Transaction Confirmation until all Options thereunder are   exercised or terminated.](9)</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>  </table>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade align="left" style="color:black;"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(8)&nbsp; Include for base capped call.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(9)&nbsp; Include for additional capped call.</font></p>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;">
<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Free   Convertibility Date:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">September&nbsp;15, 2022</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">

<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">

<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">

<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">

<td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">With respect to any Conversion Date, any Convertible   Securities with respect to which Counterparty makes the election described in   Section&nbsp;14.12 of the Indenture and the financial institution designated   by Counterparty accepts such Convertible Securities in accordance with   Section&nbsp;14.12 of the Indenture, as long as Counterparty does not submit   a Notice of Exercise in respect thereof.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>

<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">

<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">

<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Applicable, which means that on each Conversion Date   occurring on or after the Free Convertibility Date, a number of Options equal   to the number of Relevant Convertible Securities for such Conversion Date in   denominations of USD1,000 principal amount shall be automatically exercised,   subject to &#147;Notice of Exercise&#148; below.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In respect of any exercise of Options hereunder on   any Conversion Date on or after the Free Convertibility Date, 5:00 P.M., New   York City time, on the Scheduled Trading Day immediately preceding the   Expiration Date.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">

<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notice of   Exercise:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Counterparty shall notify Dealer in writing prior to   the Notice Deadline of the number of Relevant Convertible Securities being   converted on the related Conversion Date[; <i>provided</i>   that any &#147;Notice of Exercise&#148; delivered to Dealer pursuant to the Base Call   Option Transaction Confirmation shall be deemed to be a Notice of Exercise   pursuant to this Confirmation and the terms of such Notice of Exercise shall   apply, <i>mutatis mutandis</i>, to this   Confirmation](10). If Counterparty fails to give such notice when due in   respect of any exercise of Options hereunder with a Conversion Date occurring   on or after the Free Convertibility Date, Automatic Exercise shall apply and   the Conversion Date shall be deemed to be the Notice Deadline.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.0%;">

<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In addition, Counterparty shall notify Dealer in   writing before 5:00 P.M., New York City time, on the Scheduled Trading Day   immediately preceding the Free Convertibility Date of the Relevant Settlement   Method with respect to each Option exercised hereunder relating to Relevant   Convertible Securities with a Conversion Date occurring on or after the Free   Convertibility Date, the settlement method for such Relevant Convertible   Securities and, if the settlement method for such Relevant Convertible   Securities is</font></p>    </td>   </tr>  </table>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;">
<tr>
<td width="49%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.16%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.84%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">not Settlement in Shares or Settlement in Cash (each   as defined below), the fixed amount of cash per Relevant Convertible Security   (the &#147;<b>Specified Dollar Amount</b>&#148;) that   Counterparty has elected (or is deemed to have elected) to deliver to   holder(s)&nbsp;of such Relevant Convertible Securities (any such notice, a &#147;<b>Notice of Final Settlement Method</b>&#148;); <i>provided</i> that, if Counterparty does not   timely deliver the Notice of Final Settlement Method, then the Notice of   Final Settlement Method shall be deemed timely given and the Relevant   Settlement Method shall be Net Share Settlement (and, for the avoidance of   doubt, the Settlement Averaging Period shall be determined without regard to   the proviso in the definition thereof), and Counterparty shall not specify   Settlement in Shares or Low Cash Combination Settlement as the settlement   method for any Relevant Convertible Securities.&nbsp; Counterparty acknowledges its   responsibilities under applicable securities laws, and in particular   Section&nbsp;9 and Section&nbsp;10(b)&nbsp;of the Exchange Act and the   rules&nbsp;and regulations thereunder, in respect of any settlement method   election (including any such deemed settlement method election as set forth   in the proviso in the immediately preceding sentence).</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="49%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.16%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.84%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="49%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.16%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Valuation Time:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.84%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">At the close of trading of the regular trading   session on the Exchange; <i>provided</i> that   if the principal trading session is extended, the Calculation Agent shall   determine the Valuation Time in its reasonable discretion.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="49%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.16%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.84%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="49%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.16%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Market   Disruption Event:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.84%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.3(a)&nbsp;of the Equity Definitions   is hereby replaced in its entirety by the following:</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="49%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.16%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.84%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="49%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.16%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.84%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;&#145;Market Disruption Event&#146; means, in respect of a   Share, (i)&nbsp;a failure by the primary U.S. national or regional securities   exchange or market on which the Shares are listed or admitted for trading to   open for trading during its regular trading session or (ii)&nbsp;the   occurrence or existence prior to 1:00 p.m.&nbsp;(New York City time) on any   Scheduled Trading Day for the Shares for more than one half-hour period in   the aggregate during regular trading hours of any suspension or limitation   imposed on trading (by reason of movements in price exceeding limits   permitted by the relevant stock exchange or otherwise) in the Shares or in   any options contracts or futures contracts traded on any U.S. exchange   relating to the Shares.&#148;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="49%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.16%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.84%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="49%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.16%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Dealer&#146;s   Telephone Number</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 30.25pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">and Telex and/or   Facsimile Number</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 30.25pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">and Contact   Details for purpose of</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 30.25pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Giving Notice:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="48%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.84%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As specified in   Section&nbsp;6(b)&nbsp;below.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>  </table>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 3.0in;text-indent:-2.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">6<a name="PB_6_121938_3020"></a></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 3.0in;text-indent:-2.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;">
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Settlement Terms:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Settlement   Method:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For any Option, Net Share Settlement; <i>provided</i> that, if the Relevant Settlement Method set forth   below for such Option is not Net Share Settlement, then the Settlement Method   for such Option shall be such Relevant Settlement Method, but only if   Counterparty shall have notified Dealer of the Relevant Settlement Method in   the Notice of Final Settlement Method for such Option.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Relevant   Settlement Method:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In respect of any Option:</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;if   Counterparty has elected to settle its conversion obligations in respect of   the related Relevant Convertible Security (A)&nbsp;entirely in Shares   pursuant to Section&nbsp;14.02(a)(iv)(A)&nbsp;of the Indenture (together with   cash in lieu of fractional Shares) (such settlement method, &#147;<b>Settlement in Shares</b>&#148;), (B)&nbsp;in a combination of cash   and Shares pursuant to Section&nbsp;14.02(a)(iv)(C)&nbsp;of the Indenture   with a Specified Dollar Amount less than USD1,000 (such settlement method, &#147;<b>Low Cash Combination Settlement</b>&#148;) or (C)&nbsp;in a   combination of cash and Shares pursuant to   Section&nbsp;14.02(a)(iv)(C)&nbsp;of the Indenture with a Specified Dollar   Amount equal to USD1,000, then, in each case, the Relevant Settlement Method   for such Option shall be Net Share Settlement;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;if   Counterparty has elected to settle its conversion obligations in respect of   the related Relevant Convertible Security in a combination of cash and Shares   pursuant to Section&nbsp;14.02(a)(iv)(C)&nbsp;of the Indenture with a   Specified Dollar Amount greater than USD1,000, then the Relevant Settlement   Method for such Option shall be Combination Settlement; and</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;if   Counterparty has elected to settle its conversion obligations in respect of   the related Relevant Convertible Security entirely in cash pursuant to   Section&nbsp;14.02(a)(iv)(B)&nbsp;of the Indenture (such settlement method, &#147;<b>Settlement in Cash</b>&#148;), then the Relevant Settlement Method   for such Option shall be Cash Settlement.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Net Share   Settlement:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If Net Share Settlement is applicable to any Option   exercised or deemed exercised hereunder, Dealer will deliver to Counterparty,   on the relevant Settlement Date for each such Option, a number of Shares (the   &#147;<b>Net Share Settlement Amount</b>&#148;) equal   to the sum, for each Trading Day during the Settlement Averaging Period for   each such Option, of (i)&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;the Daily Option Value for such   Trading Day, <i>divided by</i> (b)&nbsp;the   Relevant Price on such Trading Day, <i>divided by</i>   (ii)&nbsp;the number of Trading Days in the Settlement Averaging Period; <i>provided</i> that in no event shall the</font></p>    </td>   </tr>  </table>
</div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">7<a name="PB_7_135650_5796"></a></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;">
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Net Share Settlement Amount for any Option exceed a   number of Shares equal to the Applicable Limit for such Option <i>divided by</i> the Applicable Limit Price on the Settlement   Date for such Option.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Dealer will pay cash in lieu of delivering any fractional   Shares to be delivered with respect to any Net Share Settlement Amount valued   at the Relevant Price for the last Trading Day of the Settlement Averaging   Period.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Combination   Settlement:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If Combination Settlement is applicable to any   Option exercised or deemed exercised hereunder, Dealer will pay or deliver,   as the case may be, to Counterparty, on the relevant Settlement Date for each   such Option:</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.5%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.66%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="60%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:60.84%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.5%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.66%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="60%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:60.84%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">cash (the &#147;<b>Combination Settlement   Cash Amount</b>&#148;) equal to the sum, for each Trading Day during the   Settlement Averaging Period for such Option, of (A)&nbsp;an amount (the &#147;<b>Daily Combination Settlement Cash Amount</b>&#148;) equal to the   lesser of (1)&nbsp;the product of (x)&nbsp;the Applicable Percentage and   (y)&nbsp;the Specified Dollar Amount <i>minus</i>   USD1,000 and (2)&nbsp;the Daily Option Value, <i>divided by</i>   (B)&nbsp;the number of Trading Days in the Settlement Averaging Period; <i>provided</i> that if the calculation in clause (A)&nbsp;above   results in zero or a negative number for any Trading Day, the Daily   Combination Settlement Cash Amount for such Trading Day shall be deemed to be   zero; and</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.5%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.66%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="60%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:60.84%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.5%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.66%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="60%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:60.84%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Shares (the &#147;<b>Combination Settlement   Share Amount</b>&#148;) equal to the sum, for each Trading Day during the   Settlement Averaging Period for such Option, of a number of Shares for such   Trading Day (the &#147;<b>Daily Combination   Settlement Share Amount</b>&#148;) equal to (A)&nbsp;(1)&nbsp;the Daily   Option Value on such Trading Day <i>minus</i> the   Daily Combination Settlement Cash Amount for such Trading Day, <i>divided by</i> (2)&nbsp;the Relevant Price on such Trading   Day, <i>divided by</i> (B)&nbsp;the number of   Trading Days in the Settlement Averaging Period; <i>provided</i>   that if the calculation in sub-clause (A)(1)&nbsp;above results in zero or a   negative number for any Trading Day, the Daily Combination Settlement Share   Amount for such Trading Day shall be deemed to be zero;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.5%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.66%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="60%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:60.84%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">provided</font></i> that in no event shall   the sum of (x)&nbsp;the Combination Settlement Cash Amount for any Option and   (y)&nbsp;the Combination Settlement Share Amount for such Option <i>multiplied by</i> the Applicable</p>    </td>   </tr>  </table>
</div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">8<a name="PB_8_135650_2897"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='8',FILE='C:\JMS\C902556\18-8505-2\task8807152\8505-2-km-03.htm',USER='c902556',CD='Mar 27 21:44 2018' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;">
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Limit Price on the Settlement Date for such Option   exceed the Applicable Limit for such Option.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Dealer will pay cash in lieu of delivering any   fractional Shares to be delivered with respect to any Combination Settlement   Share Amount valued at the Relevant Price for the last Trading Day of the   Settlement Averaging Period.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.5%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.66%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="60%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:60.84%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Cash Settlement:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If Cash Settlement is applicable to any Option   exercised or deemed exercised hereunder, in lieu of Section&nbsp;8.1 of the   Equity Definitions, Dealer will pay to Counterparty, on the relevant   Settlement Date for each such Option, an amount of cash (the &#147;<b>Cash Settlement Amount</b>&#148;) equal to the sum, for each   Trading Day during the Settlement Averaging Period for such Option, of   (i)&nbsp;the Daily Option Value for such Trading Day, <i>divided by</i>   (ii)&nbsp;the number of Trading Days in the Settlement Averaging Period.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Daily Option   Value:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For any Trading Day, an amount equal to (i)&nbsp;the   Option Entitlement on such Trading Day, <i>multiplied by</i>   (ii)&nbsp;(A)&nbsp;the lesser of the Relevant Price on such Trading Day and   the Cap Price, <i>less</i> (B)&nbsp;the Strike Price   on such Trading Day; <i>provided</i> that   if the calculation contained in clause (ii)&nbsp;above results in a negative   number, the Daily Option Value for such Trading Day shall be deemed to be   zero. In no event will the Daily Option Value be less than zero.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Applicable   Limit:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For any Option, an amount of cash equal to the   Applicable Percentage <i>multiplied by</i>   the excess of (i)&nbsp;the aggregate of (A)&nbsp;the amount of cash, if any,   paid to the holder of the related Relevant Convertible Security upon   conversion of such Relevant Convertible Security and (B)&nbsp;the number of   Shares, if any, delivered to the holder of the related Relevant Convertible   Security upon conversion of such Relevant Convertible Security<i> multiplied by</i> the Applicable Limit Price on the   Settlement Date for such Option, over (ii)&nbsp;USD1,000.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Applicable Limit   Price:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On any day, the opening price as displayed under the   heading &#147;Op&#148; on Bloomberg page&nbsp;&#147;PLUG &lt;equity&gt;&#147; (or any successor   thereto).</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Trading Day:</font></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="66%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:66.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A day on which (i)&nbsp;there is no Market   Disruption Event and (ii)&nbsp;trading in the Shares generally occurs on the   Exchange or, if the Shares are not then listed on the Exchange, on the   principal other U.S. national or regional securities exchange on which the   Shares are then listed or, if the Shares are not then listed on a U.S.   national or regional securities exchange, on the principal other market on   which the Shares are then listed or admitted for trading. If the Shares are   not so listed or admitted for trading, &#147;Trading Day&#148; means a Business Day.</font></p>    </td>   </tr>  </table>
</div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">9<a name="PB_9_135650_3020"></a></p>
